component.name: HelloWorld
component.script:
'** '** Example: Edit a Label size and color with BrightScript '**
function init() m.top.setFocus(true) m.myLabel = m.top.findNode("myLabel")
'Set header text m.myLabel.text = headerText()
'Set the font size m.myLabel.font.size=headerSize()
'Set the color to light blue m.myLabel.color=headerColor()
'** '** The full list of editable attributes can be located at: '** http://sdkdocs.roku.com/display/sdkdoc/Label#Label-Fields '** end function
